com.aurel.track.report.dashboardConfig

Interface IPluginDashboard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityStream, AverageTimeToCloseItem, BasePluginDashboardView, BurnDownChart, CalendarDash, ManagerView, MeetingsDashboard, ModifiedFiles, MyFilters, MyFilterView, MyItems, MyTqlView, MyWatch, ProjectFilterDashboardView, ProjectSummary, QuickSearchView, ReleaseNotes, ReportsAndFilters, StatusOverTimeGraph, TimePeriodDashboardView, TwoDimensionalStatistic, UserLoad, VersionControlActivity

    public interface IPluginDashboard
    This interface define some operation needed for dashboard plugin. If you want to develop a new dashboard plugin you should extend BasePluginDashboardView
